name: Net Runner (A_Sandwich)
description:
I haven't made a game in a while and making games is harder than I remembered! :D Anyway, I hope you enjoy my game where you play as a hacker trying to collect data packets and get out! You use WASD or the arrow keys to control your character. You leave a trail behind you that you cannot cross, so you may be your own worst enemy!

I hope you enjoy it!

My awful source code: https://github.com/A-Sandwich/Godot-Wild-Jam-37
